item.title: Introducing AI-powered incident prioritization in Microsoft Defender
item.description: Every SOC analyst faces this challenge: multiple incidents, same severity, and different sources. When everything looks equally urgent, the real question becomes what do you investigate first? And how do you address it consistently across shifts, analysts, and tool stacks? Security teams don’t struggle because they lack alerts—they struggle because they have too many, arriving faster than humans can triage.
